performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Units/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: Number of components placed per hour. This is heavily influenced by component size, complexity, and line speed.

performance_metrics.name: Accuracy (X/Y/Z)
performance_metrics.description: Accuracy of component placement in X, Y, and Z axes. Crucial for high-reliability applications.

performance_metrics.name: Cycle Time (Seconds)
performance_metrics.description: Time taken to complete a single component placement process, including pick & place, solder paste application, and reflow.

performance_metrics.name: Component Placement Success Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of components successfully placed without errors, including misplacement, damage, or rework.

performance_metrics.name: Reflow Temperature Uniformity
performance_metrics.description: Temperature uniformity across the reflow oven – essential for consistent solder joint formation.

performance_metrics.name: Waste Rate (Component)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of components discarded due to defects or process issues.

implementation_requirements.name: PCB Size Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Ability to handle PCBs of various sizes, depending on line configuration.

implementation_requirements.name: Component Size Range
implementation_requirements.description: Ability to place components of different sizes and shapes.

implementation_requirements.name: Component Weight Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Maximum weight of components the pick & place head can handle.

implementation_requirements.name: Reflow Oven
implementation_requirements.specification: Tunnel reflow oven with temperature control accuracy of +/- 1°C
implementation_requirements.description: Provides controlled heating for solder reflow.

implementation_requirements.name: Camera System
implementation_requirements.specification: High-resolution cameras (2MP or higher) with 120° field of view
implementation_requirements.description: For component detection and process monitoring.

implementation_requirements.name: Conveyor System
implementation_requirements.description: Consistent movement of PCBs through the system.

operational_considerations: ESD Control – Implement grounding, wrist straps, and conductive work surfaces.
Cleanroom Environment – Maintain a cleanroom environment (ISO 8 or better) to minimize particle contamination.
Operator Training – Provide comprehensive training to operators on system operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
Preventive Maintenance – Establish a regular preventive maintenance schedule to ensure system reliability.
Process Monitoring – Continuously monitor key process parameters (temperature, speed, etc.) to identify potential issues.
Material Handling – Implement efficient material handling systems for solder paste, components, and PCBs.
